alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 5:34PM CST until December 17 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... South central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CST. * At 533 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Lindsay, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Purcell, Slaughterville, Lindsay, Lexington, Maysville, Wayne, Erin Springs and Payne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
